short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time by importing images and reviews directly into your CommerceHQ store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This innovative import assistant saves you time by importing images and reviews directly from the web.
CommerceHQ Importer is an app designed to help store owners move to CommerceHQ by uploading data directly from the web into their own store.

The main CommerceHQ Importer features include:
★ Upload images from the existing theme or website
If you are moving from a different platform you can download all your existing theme images with 1 click into your CommerceHQ store. This allows you to re-build your theme on CommerceHQ much more quickly.
★ Amazon review sync
You can sync all your amazon product reviews so they show up on your store with just 1 click.
★ AliExpress review sync
You can sync AliExpress product reviews so they show up on your store with just 1 click.

Some other features:
✔ Sort by largest images
✔ Inline image size display
✔ Switch between CommerceHQ stores
✔ Filter by number of review stars
✔ Filter by only reviews with images
✔ Hide empty reviews
